thread.title: Bose aims at Sonos with SoundTouch 10 speaker, adds Bluetooth and Wi-Fi to next-gen multi-room speakers

title: Bose aims at Sonos with SoundTouch 10 speaker, adds Bluetooth and Wi-Fi to next-gen multi-room speakers
text:
Bose aims at Sonos with SoundTouch 10 speaker, adds Bluetooth and Wi-Fi to next-gen multi-room speakers 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Bose has announced a new update to its SoundTouch speaker range and others that will offer multi-room listening and more. It has also unveil...
